author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: Lupin Presentation in Japan
body:
For once I beat Daniel Zelter to a piece of Lupin
news.

There will be a Lupin the Third Exhibition in Tokyo,
Japan, based upon Mine, Fujiko. The location and dates
are specified on the news brief, but further info
about the exhibition itself is unknown. 
Ohtsuka, Yasuo will attend one day with signed copies
of his book for 100 people. Ohtsuka was chief animator
and character designer for many of the earlier Lupin
III productions.

For more info go to http://www.nausicaa.net.

P.S.--Anyone else getting the Castle Cagliostro Region
2 DVD set?
